text: Andrei Gennadyevich Sveshnikov (; born 22 March 1979 in Moscow) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Saturn Ramenskoye players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Oryol players Category:Kapaz PFK players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Azerbaijan Category:Association football defenders
title: Andrei Sveshnikov
